alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 12:45PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHARLOTTE AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM EST... At 1244 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Myers, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Olga, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Buckingham, Villas, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Whiskey Creek, Fort Myers Shores, Page Park, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, and Alva. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
